title: Write Bank smart contract in Solidity
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Write a Bank contract to achieve the following functionalities:

1. Allow deposit to the Bank contract address directly through wallets like Metamask
2. Keep track of the deposit amount for each address in the Bank contract
3. Implement a withdraw() method that allows only the administrator to withdraw funds
4. Use an array to record the deposit amounts for the top 3 users

Please submit the completed project code or the GitHub repository address.

description: This challenge is designed to understand contract accounts, how contracts receive ETH, the use of receive/fallback functions, understanding payable, how to transfer ETH out of a contract, and the use of mappings and arrays.
